main event: A round white object, 15 feet in diameter, was sighted moving north-east on 13 May 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for 4 seconds before it faded out., The sighting occurred at night., The observers reported the object as round and white in color., Multiple possible explanations were given: weather balloon, astronomical, or meteor., The record is part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book.
